job_tasks.phrase: designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform
job_tasks.justification: This involves the engineering task of creating systems that connect with and utilize AI capabilities.

job_tasks.justification: This refers to the fundamental task of writing high-quality, deployable code for software products.

job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights ownership of technical design and the delivery of well-crafted code.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
job_tasks.justification: This describes a strategic approach to development, emphasizing agility and data-informed decision-making, aligning with business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images in the last couple of months
job_tasks.justification: While mentioning a GenAI tool, the engineer's role is to develop and deliver software products that interact with it, fitting under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves building software tools that incorporate AI features, fitting the definition of integrating AI into products.

soft_skills.phrase: Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.
soft_skills.justification: This directly relates to fostering effective team communication and knowledge exchange.

soft_skills.phrase: Take responsibility for component technical designs
soft_skills.justification: This indicates a proactive approach and ownership of technical deliverables.

profile.rationale: The role is primarily a Go Engineer focused on software development and integration (Macro-Category A). While the projects involve generative AI tools and AI-powered platforms, the engineer's tasks are to build and integrate software systems that use these AI capabilities, rather than developing the AI models themselves. This aligns with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer who builds software with AI/ML features as a core part of its functionality.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly specifies the core engineering language (Go) and the nature of the AI involvement (interaction with AI platforms, building AI-powered tools), allowing for a precise classification into the AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile. The responsibilities are well-defined and align directly with the coding book's categories.
